Title: MCP in Microsoft Extensions.AI – Connect to Local MCP Server Easily
Author: Learn Microsoft AI
Description:

In this video, we’ll walk you through how to connect to an MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server using Microsoft.Extensions.AI with a local setup. You’ll learn how to configure the MCP client, integrate it with your existing application, and enable real-time model context processing.
